title: No such file or directory--/relu_op_test.py
body_html:
w@w-Lenovo-Y50-70:~/pytorch$ python caffe2/python/operator_test/relu_op_test.py
python: can't open file 'caffe2/python/operator_test/relu_op_test.py': [Errno 2] No such file or directory

  • PyTorch or Caffe2:
    -- BUILD_DOCS : OFF
    -- BUILD_PYTHON : ON

so,what should I do, please.
